otherNames: Cradle-Snatcher Love, Cradle Snatcher Love, Disciple Leave the Mountain and Harm Your Sisters, 徒儿，下山祸害你师姐去吧, 高手下山，七个师姐都护我
synopsis: Chu Yi, a young man in the mountain, has been ordered by his master to come down from the mountain to fight the rich young man, kick the rich family, accompanied by beautiful school girls, and the glamorous senior sister took great care of him, and he roams around in the prosperous city.
